titles: By the King. A proclamation for recalling and prohibiting sea-men from the services of forraign princes and states
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)
Charles II, King of England, 1630-1685.
publisher: Printed by John Bill, Printer to the King's most Excellent Majesty, 1661. At the King's Printing-House in Black-Friers,
notes: Dated at end: Given at Our Court at Whitehall, the nineteenth day of April, in the thirteenth year of Our Reign.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
